tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** ******* ** ***** **  **** ************* *** *************** **knows exactly how to treat and make sure you are fully satisfied!!!
Very supportive and experienced .Not at all inclined towards money   or gives test after test . Very reasonable and make sure you don’t over spent .I thank her from bottom of my heart for a accepting my case in Such short notice .She should be in elite panel of gynaecologist. If you can get her for treatment , don’t think twice .!!       Your baby will be in hands of god !!
Thanx Rupam Mam!!!

tags: None
review: All thanks to Dr. Rupam Arora that despite gaining a lot of weight during my pregnancy, she made sure that I had a safe and normal delivery. She makes the patient really comfortable and answers all the queries ! During my entire pregnancy, she never prescribed unnecessary tests and medicines. I highly recommend her !

tags: None
review:
Doctor initially was polite and understanding.
During the final week of pregnancy, she did not treat us well.
She refused to consult with us and made to sit on wooden bench even at time of high pain for almost an hour. When we left without consulting, she called us and asked to meet at clinic. She then immediately asked to go for ecg test. And based on those reports, she asked to get admitted.
My wife got admitted in max, patparganj and there the horor started. We were informed that it might require a surgery for the delivery even when all was well. When we decided to leave hospital and get admitted to some other, she came back immediately and after discussion with us, she did some thing which started labor pain.
Max is popular for doing surgery in 9/10 cases even when it is not needed.
We applied all that reference and threatened to leave hospital, it was a normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: very poor experience with her... she never hear patient problems *********** she has no value of other people's time...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very comforting, helpful, experienced. Down to earth and full of motherly advice along her medical knowledge

tags: None
review: She is very nice and polite. With her we feel that we are in safe hands. My both children are delivered by dr roopam Arora. We are going cloudnine hospital for delivery only because of dr roopam. We like her most and thanks.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Doctor was Very polite..she explained everything well... Apart from  this she prescribed medicine and test which are actually required..

tags: Value for money,
review:
**** **** *** Very experienced Dr. Satisfactory results.
She is very good human being also. I m very thankful to her.

review: Experience and visit was good and all things explained in a better way. Very Good doctor and will recommend

review:
I am really thanksful to Dr.Rupam madam  Because of madam i have a 6 yrs old baby boy after  facing so much complication by my wife in another pregnancy before of this.
I really pray to God for ma'am.
Thanks.
